scripts.start: echo 'enter start date (blank for oldest)' && read start_date && echo 'enter end date (blank for most recent)' && read end_date && npm run parser $start_date $end_date
scripts.prompt-start-date: echo 'enter start date (blank for oldest)' && read start_date
scripts.prompt-end-date: echo 'enter end date (blank for most recent)' && read end_date
